camera.requesting: Waiting for the camera permission prompt…

body.red: You have stayed in the "Bad" zone for {{duration}}. Adjust your posture to reduce strain.
body.yellowFromGreen: Your posture moved from "Good" to "So-So" and has stayed there for {{duration}}. Take a moment to reset.
body.yellow: You have been in the "So-So" zone for {{duration}}. Straighten up to return to green.
body.break: Great work maintaining posture for {{duration}}. Take a short break to stay refreshed.

titles.setup: Let's set up your posture coach

messages.permissionUnavailable: Camera permissions are unavailable because the Electron APIs could not be loaded.
messages.permissionDenied: Camera access was denied. You can enable it via system settings to continue.
messages.permissionError: We hit an unexpected error while requesting camera access. Please try again.
messages.settingsUnavailable: System settings cannot be opened because Electron APIs are unavailable.
messages.settingsOpenError: Unable to open system settings automatically. Please open them manually to grant access.
messages.calibrationLoadError: We couldn’t load your previous calibration. Please run calibration again.
messages.electronMissing: Posely can’t access camera permissions or calibration because the Electron preload bridge is missing. Restart the app to continue.

welcome.body: Welcome to Posely. We use your webcam to monitor posture locally on your device—no footage is ever uploaded or stored. To get started, we need permission to access your camera.

requesting.body: Requesting camera access. Approve the system prompt to continue.

denied.body: We need camera access to monitor your posture in real time. You can enable the camera in your system settings, then return here to continue onboarding.

error.body: Something went wrong while requesting camera access. Check your connection and try again.

alerts.frequentUnreliable: Detection frequently reports unreliable posture ({{ratioText}}). Consider recalibrating or adjusting sensitivity.
